name: Outsider
description:
Outsider is an adventure game, made for Community Game Jam 2019 (the theme was "The game is a liar").

HOW TO PLAY:

Use the Arrows to move the character.

  • RIGHT
  • LEFT

Use backspace to Shoot your enemies.

  • FIRE

And there's one more thing:

  • Rules MUST NOT be broken.

Design & Graphics by Bernardo Benites

Code by Eduardo Scheffler

Tools:

  • Engine: Unity 3D
  • Graphics: Adobe Suite
